channel.title: Problem with leveling up screen text for thieving

item.title: Problem with leveling up screen text for thieving
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

          case 17: //Thieving
            sendFrame164(4261);
                        stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
            sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 4262);
            sendFrame126("Your thieving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 4263);
            sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level.");
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

?

item.title: Problem with leveling up screen text for thieving
item.dc:creator: @chandlerethan chandlerethan
item.description:
@chandlerethan wrote:

ok so the people that made this client took out thieving, and in code had it spelled as theiving, so i had to change every instance of it to the correct word. but anyways, when i level up my thieving it shows this:


This is my code for when i level up thieving.

case 17: //Thieving sendFrame164(4261); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level!", 6262); sendFrame126("Your thieving level is now "+playerLevel[17]+" .", 6263); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a thieving level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with leveling up screen text for thieving
